adHeader: Cello/Piano Lesson 大提琴 鋼琴
adDetails: Dr. Yvonne Chang Phone show contact info 波士頓大學音樂博士, 多年教學及樂團經驗, 專攻大提琴和鋼琴教學 即日起開始招收學生 (歡迎成人學生報名) Cupertino, Santa Clara Website: http://yufang115.wix.com/yu-fang-chang Suzuki certificated teacher Over 7 years teaching experience Education Bachelor of Music-Taipei National University of the Arts Master of Music/ Doctor of Musical Arts -Boston University Experience Assistant Principal of Silicon Valley Philharmonic Former member of Atlantic Symphony Orchestra, Waltham Symphony Orchestra, Newton Symphony Orchestra, and Boston Civic Symphony Orchestra Judge of 2012/14 CMTANC International Youth Music Competition Winner of the Forum Music Concert Series audition organized by the Department of Cultural Affairs in Taiwan (2007) We look forward to meeting you
